description: This zesty and tangy dessert is balanced with a sweet and savoury yoghurt.
name: Grape Granita Parfait Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a saucepan to a medium heat and melt the sugar into the water for 5 minutes.
Remove from the heat, add the berries and grapes and set to one side.
Once it has cooled down, use a hand blender to blitz the berry mix but not fully, leave it lumpy.
Empty contents into a freezer suitable container and freeze for 2 hours but mixing and breaking it up every 30 minutes.
In a separate bowl, combine the yoghurt with the maple syrup and cinnamon sugar.
Remove the berries from the freezer and break up again.
In a serving glass, layer the yoghurt and berries twice or 3 times per glass before serving.
